Yop !

So , i'm not really good at Tank building but i wanna try at least one craft !

This is the AMX NoName just because it's not a replica but it's full stock .

Even if i generally use mod , i like to build STOCK craft sometimes that's prevent me to forget basic construction skill .

Sure i'm not winning the "Greatest Tank Award" with this one ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

So this Tank is easy to use , At start :

- Hit 0 Key / Undock Turret / Right & Left to move / Up & Down have no effect ( Tilt less than 3% ) Turret has the Root Probe core !

- Switch to use the Core Tank , Full Throttle & SaS !

- You have 4 Ammo on the main Canon , Hit Space .

- You have 2 Missile on The Core Tank , Hit Space .

Turret is based on the STOCK Turboprop Rotor Mechanism . Tweaked for a Tank Turret . Work really great if you not driving too fast !

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-29T19:36:26Z" title="06/29/2015 07:36  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 29, 2015</time> by Jon144**
I always love seeing people make stock tanks. Hello and nice job!

Thx guy ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I'm still far from your amazing tank job & i mostly work on the turret mechanism instead of tank aesthetic .

I originaly wanna build the " AMX Leclerc " but i cannot release a real tank name for a first strike .

For the little history ; I see somewhere a guy using Docking port instead of decoupler . That way no debris left in the craft !

The core turret is inspired by a very old thread for the stock turboprop ( KSP 0.22 or something like that )

The fairing core is inspired by [SGT_Flyer engine thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/121800-Kerbal-Electric-animated-Turbofan-engines-New-Low-bypass-KT-8D-jet-engine-%21?p=1948486&viewfull=1#post1948486).

Finally the turret is a mix of this 3 ideas , i must work more on aesthetic & tank function !
